title: new client is so unstable/unoptimized
body:
I have to initiate full repair every time I open the game just to pick/ ban champions because the champion picking thing won't show up. also, the framerate drops significantly when I choose draft mode. please don't tell me to revert to the old client.

also, it's not my potato pc that is the problem
Specs: i7 4770, gtx 960, 16gb ram = should be more than enough for the new client

please release a fix instead of skins so i can actually play the game...

why cant I post an image file btw?

replies.body:
Those specs definitely meet the minimum requirements as far as I can tell! 

It's kind of odd that your fps would drop simply by choosing draft mode, since they all use the same files for the most part. That's making me feel like the main issue lies somewhere completely different than with your hardware. Since you're never seeing any champions load in the match lobby, there's a chance that your network isn't able to actually grab any of that data from our servers. 

Let's go through [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first the make sure adjusting some of those network settings doesn't do the trick. Hit me back if you're still having problems, and make sure to test those changes in a custom game.

Also! You can absolutely post images here, you just need to link the image url including the .png/.jpg and it'll show up here.

i ran the hextech repair tool and made a simple batch file to release and renew ip before launching league. that seems to have fixed the network problem but the framerate issue is still there. and i still cant figure out how to upload pics... do i have to upload it to imgur or something first?
Yup! You can use something like Imgur or Gyazo to post images here, just paste the link and make sure it's got the .png or .jpg and I'll be able to see it!
